flow.descriptionCdata:
72d5aab9-f83e-4a7e-a1bd-82738e6d4297.11b0f0fb-0be6-456a-be76-c957dff969ea.description=
Sleeps for "X" seconds.

Inputs\:
seconds - The number of seconds to sleep.

Responses\:
success - Slept for "X" seconds.
failure - was unable to sleep for some reason
72d5aab9-f83e-4a7e-a1bd-82738e6d4297.38682308-eac5-4400-91b5-bbb5da9d0460.description=
Iterates through a list of values. If the list changes while running, the updates will be appended to the list.

Inputs\:
separator - The list separator (or delimiter).
list - The list to be split

Responses\:
has more - Another value was in the list, and has been returned.
failure - failed to process the list.
no more - The iterator has gone fully through the list. This response will only be returned once per iteration through the list, a subsequent call to the Iterator will restart the Iteration through the list.

Returns\:
The current element of the list, if the response is has more
72d5aab9-f83e-4a7e-a1bd-82738e6d4297.616a2dda-efa9-45cb-8e76-f02952f3ef7c.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
72d5aab9-f83e-4a7e-a1bd-82738e6d4297.d8598ebc-6019-41c2-a185-e9b893508033.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
72d5aab9-f83e-4a7e-a1bd-82738e6d4297.description=
This flow  flex up sever CPU and Memory at server group level.
Inputs\:

serverList		\: The list of target VM servers
toEmail		\: To email address
fromEmail		\: From email address
smtpHost		\: The host name of the smtp server
smtpPort		\: The port number which is used by smtp server


Response\:
success		\: Flex up succeeded for the target VMs
failure		\: Flex up failed on the target VMs
72d5aab9-f83e-4a7e-a1bd-82738e6d4297.e4e81221-a9e1-4279-a2de-89493e44b331.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
flow.name: vCenter Server Group Flex-up CPU and Memory

staticBinding.value: Failure occured when adding CPU(s) and memory to the servers in server group ${id}

step.name: vCenter Server Flex-up CPU and Memory
